name: Circle Slayer
description:
Game created along with: @FakeFlop

Controls:

A & D or Left  & Right Arrows | Lateral Movement

Space Bar or Top Arrow | Jump

Left Click  and Cursor Movement| Shooting

Slay all of the circles in each level to continue to the next one? Will you shoot them down or will you push them into the void? It's up to you! 

Hint: The cube is like no other, his sliding allows him to jump when touching any surface!

This game was made during a 72-hour long period for the #73 Mini Jam hosted by @ZahranW, @ManuGamesDev and @KingW
